GK16ruyalsvu:4199: yatra ca pratīyamānaṃ prati upasarjanīkṛtasvarthayoḥ śabdārthayoravasthānāṃ sa dhvaneḥ sa eva viṣayaḥ ' iti /
GK16ruyalsvu:4200: atra ca na tathātvamityuktaṃ nāyaṃ dhvanerviṣaya iti /
GK16ruyalsvu:4203: tathā ca rājño jagad rakṣitavyamasya punaranujamātrarakṣaṇāsiddheranyadeva nāmamātreṇa rājātvamityupahāsaparatvam /
GK16ruyalsvu:4206: 'yasyaikasyaiva doṣṇāṃ jayati daśaśatī sānvayo dvāri rudraḥ kārāgāre surāṇāṃ patarapi ca śacī cāmaravyagrahastā /
GK16ruyalsvu:4207: kanyā tasyeyamekā rajanicarapatereṣa śuddhāntameko bālo niḥśaṅkamasyāḥ praviśati ca namaste 'se vaiṣṇavāya' //
GK16ruyalsvu:4214: tatra dvayoḥ prākaraṇikayoraprākaraṇikayoḥ prākaraṇikāprakaraṇikayor vā śliṣṭapadopanibandhe śleṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalsvu:4215: tatrādyaṃ prakāradvayaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasāmya eva tṛtīyastu prakāro viśeṣaṇasāmya eva bhavati /
GK16ruyalsvu:4228: ataśca tṛtīyaḥ prakāro viśeṣaṇasāmya eva bhavatīti vyāvacchredaphalam /
GK16ruyalsvu:4229: anyathā hi prakāradvayasyāsya viśeṣyasāmyābhāve 'pi darśanādavyātpiḥ syāt /
GK16ruyalsvu:4233: utsṛtṣṭāmbaradṛṣṭavigrahabharā yasya smarāgresarā yodhā daivavadhūstanāśca na dadhuḥ kṣobhaṃ sa vo 'vyājjinaḥ' //
GK16ruyalsvu:4236: etadapi viśeṣyasāmye kiṃ na bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha-viśeṣyasāmye tvityādi /
GK16ruyalsvu:4244: atra copamāyā eva vyaṅgyatvaṃ yuktaṃ nātiśayokteriti prakṛtānupayogādiha noktam /
GK16ruyalsvu:4245: nanu ca yathaivāyaṃ dhvanirviṣayastathaivādyamapi bhedadvayaṃ kiṃ na bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha-ādya ityādi /
GK16ruyalsvu:4253: 'yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgā ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16ruyalsvu:4254: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ' //
GK16ruyalsvu:4257: 'svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehīti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti duḥkham /
GK16ruyalsvu:4270: nirasya puṣpeṣu ruciṃ samagrāṃ padmā virejuḥ śramaṇā yathaiva' //
